scripts.postinstall: rm -rf sample/node_modules/react-native-yandex-payment && mkdir sample/node_modules/react-native-yandex-payment && rsync -av --progress . sample/node_modules/react-native-yandex-payment --exclude example --exclude sample --exclude node_modules --exclude .git
scripts.doctor: rm -rf node_modules && rm -f package-lock.json && rm -rf example/node_modules && rm -f example/package-lock.json && yarn run install:deps
scripts.install:deps: yarn install && cd example && yarn install && cd ios && pod install && cd .. && cd .. && cd ios && pod install
scripts.git:reset: rm -rf .git && git init && git add -A && git commit -m 'Initial commit'
scripts.android: cd example && yarn run android && cd ..
scripts.ios: cd example && yarn run ios && cd ..
